tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited today Dr Ankeshfor consultation regarding PCOS/PCOD, and I am incredibly satisfied with the experience. From the very beginning, he has demonstrated a profound understanding of PCOS/PCOD, explaining the condition in a way that was easy to comprehend. The doctor emphasized the importance of maintaining a clean lifestyle, highlighting how it can significantly help in managing and treating PCOS/PCOD. This information was both enlightening and encouraging for me. He and his staff has made me very comfortable as i was in a shocked stage.

The consultation process was very comfortable, as Dr Ankesh made sure to ask questions in a friendly manner, always seeking permission before delving into more personal topics. This respectful approach helped in building trust and made me feel at ease.

The sonography and other tests were conducted at the hospital, which boasts an excellent and helpful staff. The hospital maintained high standards of cleanliness, which was very reassuring. Additionally, all the necessary facilities for sonography, blood tests, and obtaining medicines were conveniently available on-site.

Overall, I am grateful for the comprehensive care provided by Doctor and the supportive environment of the hospital. The experience has given me a clearer understanding of PCOS/PCOD and confidence in managing it. I highly recommend him to anyone seeking ************* *** compassionate care.

context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: *** ****** ** *** **** ****** *** ******** ***** ***** *** **** He, Dr. Raju and their team at Pushpaa Hospital are always available to help at any given time of the day (or night for that matter). The only doctor I have seen so invested in his patients that he checks up on you upfront. Truly a non judgemental doctor who is always ready to support and happily answer to endless questions. Would never ridicule any anxiety. He is always there to hold your hand and guide towards the ray of hope when you need it the most. You are truly God sent Dr. Ankesh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Visiting the doctor can often be a daunting experience, filled with anxiety and uncertainty. However, during my recent visit, I encountered Dr. Ankesh Sahetya whose demeanor instantly put me at ease. His friendly nature and warm smile made the entire consultation feel more like a conversation with a trusted friend than a clinical assessment.

His calm and composed manner was incredibly reassuring. As he explained my condition, he did so with such clarity and patience that all my fears began to dissipate. He assured me that there was no need to worry and that things would be alright.

Thank you so much for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I've struggled with painful periods for as long as I can remember, and despite visiting numerous doctors throughout my life, I was always met with the same dismissive responses - lose weight and endure the pain as it's supposedly "normal". As I grew older, the suggestion to start a family was often thrown my way as if it were a cure-all without any explanation.

However, everything changed when I met Dr. Ankesh. Finally, I received the right advice and diagnosis that had I’ve been looking for the longest time. Dr. Ankesh took the time to listen to my concerns, thoroughly explained every aspect of my condition, and treated me with the utmost respect and empathy.

Unlike previous experiences, Dr. Ankesh didn't just brush off my pain as something to tolerate or dismiss it as a consequence of my weight. Instead, he approached my case with genuine care and professionalism. He patiently educated me about my condition and proposed tailored treatment options that truly addressed my needs.

Dr. Ankesh's commitment to his patients' well-being is unparalleled. He ensures that his patients are fully informed every step of the way, empowering them to make well-informed decisions about their health.

Thanks to Dr. Ankesh, I finally found the gynecologist I've been searching for all these years. His expertise, compassion, and dedication have made a significant difference in my life. I am immensely grateful to have him as my healthcare provider, and I wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone seeking exceptional gynecological care.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind words.. God bless you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Amazing doctor! I have been suffering from an infection for over a year and I had been to some of the most renowned hospitals of Mumbai, however nobody could even do a proper diagnosis of the problem. After suffering for almost 18 months I went to Dr. Ankesh Sahetya, he listened to the problem really well instead of jumping to writing prescriptions and did extra research on his own for my problem. Finally after around 25 days of medication and minimal tests, my infection is down by 90%. There was only one follow up after the first visit, and that was enough. Instead of going to some new doctor multiple times and spending thousands in visitation charges and medications, I would really recommend trusting Dr. Ankesh once and going through his treatment. He is an honest man and wants the best for his patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Don’t think much just book a appointment n meet him he has all solutions..main thing his words will give u that comfort which medicine ll not,I highly recommend him no chance to get disappointed my guarantee u ll just love the doctor for sure ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️he ll make u feel as if v r part of his family ❤️❤️❤️
I went to Dr.Ankesh as I had irregular periods and my mom was a ovarian cancer patient...he told us to do some blood test n we got the reports in which CA 125 was 170 which was high n me n my husband thought that same like my mom even I m positive for cancer..I was literally crying in front of him he explained us don’t worry there is nothing to worry like n he told my husband I take her responsibility nothing ll happen to her it’s a cyst n we ll operate it on Monday n she ll b fine but b4 that  we ll go for mri and then we ll remove her cyst..next day cyst was not seen in mri it got cured by medicine he prescribed..Now the confusion was when everything was normal why was my ca125 high so he discussed my case with two oncologist with his dad and other doctors too every possibility he did for us just to know why was my ca 125 high and he came to conclusion not to go with any kind of operation..some medicine he prescribed us.we were so happy 😀 he is a genuine doctor who believes in heeling the patient and trust me he is very friendly caring humble kind and loving person.Dr Ankesh is a very  dedicative kind humble friendly loving caring concern doctor.Also actively reply’s on wats up too..**** *** **** ** **** **** ******thank u so much Ankesh sahetya for being so supportive to ur patient 😍😍😍

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ‘I am a human first, then a doctor, I have my ethics’ - These words were uttered by doc when I asked for a delivery by caesarean, unable to bear labour anymore and knowing that I was going through a stillbirth. He checked on me through the night and made sure I had a natural delivery by morning. Doc and his entire staff were deeply disturbed and concerned by what had happened and took sensitive care of me and my entire family especially my mother. I met him about a year ago for conception and it has been a journey led by him with compassion, professionalism, expertise and patience. He works step by step and does not push to put one’s body through extreme measures straightaway. I always felt I was meeting my own brother, the warmth and kindness along with the time he gives to understand the entire background and address all my concerns with explaining exactly what we were doing is remarkable. He went out of his way and organised an HSG for me under anaesthesia, for which I’m very grateful. He’s carrying on and building on his father’s legacy standing out in his profession and making everyone proud. I would more than recommend doc and his staff, trust him blindly, it’s going to be a beautiful experience.

review: I visited Dr. Ankesh in the hope of getting help with problems that I had been facing for a while, with hormonal contraception. The doctor made me feel welcome from the moment I entered his office and heard me out completely. He then explained why I was feeling the way I was and suggested alternatives, that I feel hopeful about. What I appreciated most though was his insistence that “if you’re not happy, it’s not worth it.” That meant a lot to me as a patient because it validated my experiences and reminded me what my priorities should be. I will not forget this experience, and I highly recommend Dr. Ankesh to any woman or couple that needs support - both medical and emotional.

review: I was recommended Dr Ankesh through a friend and I cannot be more than happy to be introduced to this gem. It was my first time with a male gynecologist and meeting him not only resolved my queries but it was the best visit I ever had. He made me feel so comfortable and at ease that I felt like I was talking to a friend. The "stigma" about being treated was resolved within the second I walked into his cabin. He takes his time to explain you theory in the most simplest manner and not once did i felt that i was being rushed into the diagnosis. I have been to 3 other gynecologist in the last 3 years and I was always felt that my PCOD is my fault and it was a huge mountain to climb. But Dr Ankesh kept assuring me that this is all treatable and instill confidence in me that he is with me during this process. For the first time I felt like we both were on the same side. His knowledge, expertise, warmth and process for treatment is why you should visit him. I highly recommend him to everyone. Trust me once you meet him, you know that your problem is going to be treated and not just shoved aside. He has always been available to answer my slightest to silliest queries. He's not just a doctor but he's an experience which you would want to keep revisiting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Ankesh is an amazing, empathetic and understanding Doctor. He does not just treat the problem, but heals the situation. As I bled beyond the menopausal deadline, Doctor did an internal examination to discover my endometrial lining was thicker than the healthy marker. He suggested a D&C and hysterectoscopy to rule out abnormalities. The biopsy report came and Doctor called me in to explain my options - wait and watch or get a preventative laparoscopic hysterectomy done.

He explained to me the pros and cons of both the options. My husband and I decided to take the “prevention is better than cure” course.

Dr Ankesh called us in for a Counselling session to explain the entire procedure and answer every one of our questions. We felt safe and secure going through the procedure with him.

From pre-operative to post-operative care, Dr Ankesh & his entire team have scaled heights of caring and healing, including his Anaesthetologist who kept a check on my blood glucose levels till discharge.

I feel blessed to be treated by the best. 

Despite my kind of nervous disposition caused by 31 years of type 1 diabetes, I actually felt relaxed and confident that I will emerge healed from this procedure. 

And, yes Dr. Ankesh you are not just a Doctor who treats and cures, but also a healer who understands and you brought me back strong and smiling.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind words 😊🙏

God bless !

review:
I have visited Dr Ankesh several times. His approach towards the patients, explanation of the treatment, medications everything is just amazing....
I visited him first time for a fungal infection issue during lockdown... He made us understand the whole problem, gave proper medications and always took follow up...
The treatment worked very well and it was cured within 2 weeks....
Immediately after 3 mnths I realised I was pregnant.... From that time till my delivery, he was always beside me like a friend guiding me through all the thicks and thins....
Even though after 7mnths I had been to my mom's place he was always in touch with me asking about the health updates and finally when the delivery time came I had to shift back to mumbai due to some emergency and Dr Ankesh welcomed us with open arms and his smiling face...
We are now happy parents of a healthy baby boy...
All thanks to him...
Dr Ankesh and the whole team at Pushpa Hospital are very co operative and they take care of you and your baby like a family....
I came in search of a doctor but now I've got a friend like family for life...
Thank you so much Dr Ankesh for your timely treatment and being there for us throughout our journey...

With you always

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
During this terrible lockdown, my constant fear was and had been that my loved ones should not fall ill or have to visit a doctor, clinic or a hospital. Ironically, the chosen one happened to be myself. All of a sudden late evening, I started having severe cramps in my pelvic region with severe pain radiating to my back. The first thing which came to my mind was either it is an ovarian cyst or a kidney stone as I happened to be diagnosed with them sometime back but was in clear till now. Tried connecting with all the doctors known to me but somehow did not get the revert and did not know how to go about as the agony was unbearable. Tried self-medicating as had previously too had incidents similar to these but it just seemed to worsen. And, then, I recollected my best friends doctor and thought of contacting him. He was like a Messiah, a saviour. A prompt reply, prescription and also papers so that we could go for diagnosis and not only that he ensured that he spoke to the sonologist. After confirmation, that an ovarian cyst had burst, he asked us to come to the clinic so that he could explain the line of treatment.
I, really appreciate that at the time when everyone's safety is at stake, he was true to his profession, met us, guided and explained and was ever so courteous to even ask us to inform him the very next day about my well-being.
Very rarely one comes across someone who takes his "Hippocrates oath" so seriously. Gratitude always. Satwinder Nair

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Absolutely recommended!

I visited Dr. Ankesh following referrals from my mother and my sister and his Instagram sessions for discomfort during periods and associated problems. This was my first visit to a gynaecologist ever. I was noticeably apprehensive and shy about the visit. Catching on to this fear, Dr. Ankesh made me comfortable with the entire consultation. He took a thorough interest in learning about my lifestyle and habits and more importantly what made that consultation necessary for me. Throughout the consultation, our interaction was without fear of judgment which, in my opinion, is very important. I was diagnosed with hypothyroidism a year back. When informed about the diagnosis, Dr. Ankesh asked questions related to the symptoms that led to the diagnosis, the medical reports and the treatment thereafter which left no stone unturned in terms of knowing previous medical history. At the end of this briefing, Dr. Ankesh frankly and openly said that he was unwilling to order tests and medicines that are unwarranted which was much to my surprise because I was expecting a long list of blood tests and examinations. 

Two major practises of Dr. Ankesh that makes me want to follow his advice to the letter are: (1) Dr. Ankesh explains the cause/problem without using any heavy medical jargon or words that may cause some anxiety or stress. He uses plastic organ models and drawings in his explanation and how the course of action recommended by him would address the problem. (2) The lifestyle modifications recommended by him are doable and gradual and does not give an impression of a ‘do or die’ situation. 

Dr. Ankesh does not hurry through a consultation. He is calm, patient and definitely not a doctor who is just trying to empty his waiting room 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Ankesh Sahetya lives up to what one would have gathered from his Instagram page. I have done one consultation visit and one follow up with him so far. 

A little about me: I am 29 years old, married. My presenting concerns were irregular periods, multiple small follicles in the ovaries, acne, some weight gain on and off, hairfall, stress, elevated Insulin and Blood Sugar levels and extremely high Prolactin despite not being pregnant. 

Here's why my experience with him was a positive one and why I'd highly recommend him to any of my friends: 

1. He built a good rapport with me and made me feel comfortable. 
2. I was given all the information that I needed, to my satisfaction. All my follow up questions were answered patiently and in a way that I would understand better. He performed an ultrasound for me in his clinic itself which gave us the most recent and new information about my uterus- we discovered a few cysts on both ovaries. He also calmly went through a checklist related to PCOS for me and also explained specifically what the severity of my case looks like. I learned that it wasn't as severe as I was assuming. 
3. His prescription was spot on- he prescribed a medicine for reducing the cyst and a supplement for regulating Insulin processing. In just 16-17 days, my Insulin and blood sugar levels reduced (this was also along with an meal plan I was following from a different nutrition expert), I got my period and was able to get further hormone tests done. 
4. The follow up has been good- he checked on all the things he had prescribed earlier to me and also told me what the test results meant and prescribed a medication as needed. 
5. I did not think that I was made to do unnecessary procedures or take unnecessary medication. I worry a lot and therefore I look these things up a lot and I have been satisfied with his process. 
6. His availability- I was given an appointment both times as per my convenience, and he is also easily approachable and responsive on WhatsApp. 
7. The facilities are quite decent and the nurses and he also made me feel physically comfortable in all the procedures that they carried out. 

I am very glad my Husband found him when he was looking up good Doctors for PCOS and his search results suggested that Dr Ankesh Sahetya is the best person to go to. I am very happy with my experience and would want to continue consulting him in the future. I wish him the best of health and success in his endeavors!

This was my first experience with a male Gynaecologist and consulting Dr Ankesh Sahetya made me realise it was a good decision. I made an appointment with him after seeing the vast knowledge he posts on his Instagram page.

I consulted him for my PCOS. He is super calm, friendly,down to earth and not judgmental and listens,answers and explains everything patiently. My Sonography was done at the clinic itself by him and he explained the findings to me. He also gave me a PCOS diet chart to be followed along with the medication. He is also active on WhatsApp and answers my queries promptly.

I'm so glad I consulted him and look forward for my next visit and would definitely recommend him to others.

Special mention to the Sister at the reception, she's sweet and friendly and made me so at ease and calmed my nerves throughout.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was in United States and I was 5months pregnant when I got a report saying I was carrier for a genetic disorder. I was asked to get amniocentesis done to know if I have transferred it to my baby. I wasn't sure if I should go about it, I wanted to consult a doctor in India as I thought genes are race specific. I looked out for a specialist on Google and Practo, I was amazed by the reviews Dr. Sahetya had and I immediately called him with my issue. He was so prompt in his response. I got a video call from him within 5mins and he knew exactly what that disorder is and the consequences of it. He calmly explained it to me and my husband about it and asked us to go ahead with the test. He is a very knowledgeable doctor. I have consulted doctors in India and they were completely unaware of the condition I was carrying as these reports vare very rare in India. I recommend you to visit him at least once.

thank you very much for your kind words.

God bless🙏😊

Dr Ankesh and the team at Pushpa Hospital are absolutely the best. Before consulting Dr Ankesh, I had severe anxiety and stress whenever I would consult any OB-GYN. In all my past experiences, I always consulted lady doctors as I felt they would understand me better and make me feel more comfortable but I was very wrong in my thinking . Scheduling an in-person  appointment with Dr Ankesh was one of the best decisions of my life.
He takes his time to listen to you and answers every single question in detail. He provides the best advice and  will never suggest anything that might be risky or not right for you. I felt extremely comfortable at each appointment. 
I was very scared to get certain examinations due to my low tolerance of pain but he gave me confidence and assured me everything was going to be ok. He and the nurses are extremely patient and kind.  I felt like family members were taking care of me. He also provided counselling to my husband and I to prepare us for the future and for family planning. The entire experience was extremely comfortable and positive. 
This is a family run practice and there is a lot of love and care shown towards the patients. I would recommend Dr Ankesh and Pushpa Hospital to women of all ages, whether you have questions in your mind regarding your health, general check up  or if you are thinking of family planning-  this is a one stop destination with the best people to take care of you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Being a lean girl who only had Acne as a symptom I never thought I'd have pcod. However I got myself checked after reading alot about the subject, and turned out that there are cysts in my Ovaries. I came Across Dr. Ankesh Sahetya on Practo and honestly this was the best Doctor I could have found. He listens very patiently to the history, explains the issue in depth along with a practical model and provides effective solutions. Meeting a Doctor who is so positive and motivating instantly made me feel positive about the entire situation. I walked into the clinic feeling anxious and low and walked out with the calmest mind - the one that I haven't had in a long time. He also provides a complete diet chart and gives a life mantra - a way of leading a good life.
He explains, motivates and makes one feel so confident in such a way, that it ignites the inner spirit within to just get up, live a healthy lifestyle and just fight the disorders.

He is very prompt with answering all queries on WhatsApp even on Sundays (something which is very rare) . Finding a Doctor who genuinely cares so much about the health of his patients is really a blessing. With the treatment, Diet and a healthy lifestyle prescribed by Dr, I know for sure that I'm gonna kick off Pcod from my life for good! I'm so positive about it! Thanks to Dr. Ankesh Sahetya!
reply_text:
Thank you so much for the kind words !!!

God bless !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I found Dr.Ankesh on social media and I am so glad I did! 

I am usually very anxious before seeing a doctor because I am unsure if the doctor will be sympathetic enough or will rush me through the session. After attending a lot of his online seminars, I gauged that Dr. Ankesh will definitely be extremely patient and positive and I was correct!

As the clinic is almost 3 hours from my place during peak hours, I was late for my appointment. But Dr. Ankesh was sweet enough to wait for us. Though there were patients before my appointment, the wait time was minimal, reception area is pretty neat & the staff extremely humble. 

Even though it was my first appointment & I was very nervous, his positivity is infectious! He ensures that you and your partner are extremely comfortable. The sonography was done in-house(super convenient) and by the doctor himself. He explains every bit of the diagnosis(what I never received from most doctors) & is an excellent counsellor. Dr. Ankesh has been my 4th overall, 3rd gynac for treatment of PCOS, and 1st ever male doctor. And I was mindblown to have found a doctor who doesn't make you feel - conscious, stressed or unheard. 

I finally see a ray of hope, hoping to heal under this holistic guidance!
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind words.

God bless.

review: Since past few years I have been struggling with endometriosis, i have consulted few gynaecologist for my problem but was never satisfied with the answers.being so young and going through endometriosis i had so many doubts and questions.and recently i was going through some pain and miss periods that’s when I consulted Dr ANKESH SAHETYA He patiently listened to all my problems my 4 year history of medication treatment & surgery and he asked if I’m comfortable for sonography he needed to know the cause of my current pain and thats when he diagnosed me with adenomyosis and endometriosis cyst.i got worried but the way dr ankesh and his nurse staff treated me was overwhelming he has a great way of connecting with his patients and putting them at ease.he also explained me my treatment options and promised me that i will get through this and the good thing is that he’s friendly and he makes you smile and when it comes to going out for some tests in this pandemic sounds scary..but thank god they have everything in there hospital I don’t need to go anywhere else for any tests eg.blood,sonogram etc.and finally All my doubts are clear now i know my treatment options and most importantly * **** *** ** *** **** ************* ************ *** **** **** friendly doctor...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We were terminating an unplanned pregnancy, it was our first time doing this. Dr. Ankesh sensed our nervousness immediately and put us at ease by making sure we knew that this is an unfamiliar, yet a common procedure. 

He explained to us in detail the implications of going through with the procedure (we chose suction aspiration), both physically and emotionally. He also busted some popular myths about future conception, without mincing his words he educated us about the reproductive system and it’s nature, a space that we all could gain more knowledge in. 

The process overall was smooth, quick, transparent and pain free. We were made very comfortable by the hospital staff.

We would also like to add, that in a society like ours Dr. Ankesh and his staff’s approach was free of judgement ehich put my husband and I at ease. Dr. Ankesh was extremely sensitive through the whole process and that helped build trust which will now last a lifetime. We will definitely continue being patrons of Dr. Ankesh’s clinic and would very strongly recommend him. Thank you!
